jobs_results.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs_results.description:
MOBILE Developer

- Contribuer à l'organisation et à la facilitation des cérémonies scrum, y compris le standup, la planification du sprint, le backlog grooming, la rétrospective, les démonstrations.

- Coder des sous-parties de notre logiciel d'applications mobiles.

- Créer, maintenir et réviser l'architecture logicielle, les spécifications de conception, les descriptions d'interface et d'autres documentations logicielles.

- Tester et améliorer le système logiciel afin d'en améliorer les performances et la fiabilité.

- Gérer les sous-projets logiciels.

- Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les autres membres de l'équipe afin d'amener avec succès les prototypes à l'étude clinique.

- Veiller au respect des politiques de l'entreprise, y compris en matière de protection de la vie privée et de la confidentialité des données (HIPAA), ainsi que des autres exigences légales et réglementaires.

Solides connaissances en développement iOS pour appareils mobiles à l'aide de Swift.

Familiarité avec les frameworks iOS tels que RxSwift, Core Data et SwiftUI.

Une expérience avérée avec BLE est essentielle.

Comprendre le contrôle des changements, le contrôle de la conception et la gestion du cycle de vie du développement logiciel dans le contexte du développement d'applications iOS.

La connaissance des cadres et outils de tests automatisés pour le développement iOS, tels que XCTest, est essentielle.

Familiarité avec les outils d'analyse statique du code comme Sonar Cloud.

Connaissance avancée de CI/CD et de l'automatisation.

Maîtrise de l'anglais et du français (de préférence).

Une expérience en Flutter/Dart est un plus.

Une connaissance approfondie et une expérience du cycle de vie formel des logiciels de dispositifs médicaux est un plus.

Formation :

Une licence en ingénierie, en informatique ou dans un domaine connexe, ou une combinaison équivalente d'études et d'expérience professionnelle.

Plus de 5 ans d'expérience dans le domaine du développement de logiciels mobiles pour les appareils médicaux ou dans un domaine connexe.

Plus de 2 ans d'expérience dans les frameworks IoS tels que RxSwift, Core Data et SwiftUI.

La connaissance des normes ISO 13485, ISO 14971, ISO 62366, ISO 62304 et des orientations en matière de cybersécurité et de protection des données est un atout.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Engineer (f/m/x) – Corporate Bank Technology - Commercial Banking
jobs_results.description:
Job Description:

About the job

Deutsche Bank Technology in Berlin

DB Technology is a global team of tech specialists, spread across multiple trading hubs and tech centres. We have a strong focus on promoting technical excellence – our engineers work at the forefront of financial services innovation using cutting-edge technologies.

Our Berlin location is our most recent addition to our global network of tech centres and growing strongly. We are committed to building a diverse workforce and to creating excellent opportunities for talented engineers and technologists. Our tech teams and business units use agile ways of working to create #GlobalHausbank solutions from our home market.

Corporate Bank Technology - Commercial Banking

Our team is a global team of 3000 coders (and growing!) across 30 countries. The primary businesses that Corporate Bank support are Cash Management, Securities Services, Trade Finance and Trust & Agency Services. CB Technology support these businesses through CIO aligned teams and by 'horizontals' such as Client Connectivity, Surveillance and Regulatory, Infrastructure, Architecture, Production, and Risk & Control.

As an iOS Developer (m/f/x), your role will involve working within an agile Scrum team to develop and implement new features for our products that are designed for small and medium-sized corporate clients within Deutsche Bank.

-> You love this job but feel you cannot tick 100% of the boxes? Send us your CV anyway!

Your key responsibilities
• Actively contribute to the development of a shared codebase for our mobile applications targeting small and medium-sized corporations within Deutsche Bank
• Utilize your engineering expertise in the development of new features and ensure the cleanliness and industry-standard compliance of the codebase
• Prioritize the use of modern technologies, design principles, and agile methodologies in your daily work
• Regularly participate in peer reviews with your team to ensure the quality, extensibility, and reusability of your code
• Engage proactively within the engineering community, share your expertise, and establish a robust network

Your skills and experiences
• Possess a degree in a tech/scientific field or equivalent work experience
• Extensive knowledge of native iOS development Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, RxSwift/Combine/Swift concurrency and clean architecture, MVVM-C architecture patterns
• Understand CI/CD concepts and hands-on experience with GitHub Actions
• Possess a strong understanding of the software development lifecycle, write reusable and maintainable code, and have hands-on experience with Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD), particularly using GitHub Actions
• A team player, with strong (English) communication skills, who enjoys sharing knowledge and best practices, learns quickly, listens carefully, and is willing to mentor junior engineers

What we offer

We provide you with a comprehensive portfolio of benefits and offerings to support both, your private and professional needs.
• Emotionally and mentally balanced
A positive mind helps us master the challenges of everyday life – both professionally and privately. We offer consultation in difficult life situations as well as mental health awareness trainings.
• Physically thriving
We support you in staying physically fit through an offering to maintain personal health and a professional environment. You can benefit from health check-ups; vaccination drives as well as advice on healthy living and nutrition.
• Socially connected
Networking opens up new perspectives, helps us thrive professionally and personally as well as strengthens our self-confidence and well-being. You can benefit from PME family service, FitnessCenter Job, flexible working (e.g parttime, hybrid working, job tandem) as well as an extensive culture of diversity, equity and inclusion.
• Financially secure
We provide you with financial security not only during your active career but also for the future. You can benefit from offerings such as pension plans, banking services, company bicycle or “Deutschlandticket”.

Since our offerings slightly vary across locations, please contact your recruiter with specific questions.

This job is available in full and parttime.

In case of any recruitment related questions, please get in touch with Binh Bui.

Contact Binh Bui: +49 030 34073081

We strive for a culture in which we are empowered to excel together every day. This includes acting responsibly, thinking commercially, taking initiative and working collaboratively.

Together we share and celebrate the successes of our people. Together we are Deutsche Bank Group.

We welcome applications from all people and promote a positive, fair and inclusive work environment.

jobs_results.title: iOS App-Developer (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
Location: Berlin preferred, remote work from other locations possible (offices in Hamburg and Tübingen)

Tasks:
• Building a new sub-unit of the development team to develop our mobile apps.
• Further development of the app front end for iOS in Swift.
• Further development of the app back end in Ruby on Rails and MySQL.
• Shaping and brainstorming in the process of further development of our apps in close cooperation with our sales and support staff.

Your skills – that’s what you bring to the table:
• Experience in the development of mobile iOS apps.
• Successfully completed university degree in computer science or comparable training or similar experience in at least one of the above areas.
• Language skills in English, as our IT team communicates in English.
• Strong analytical skills to identify and develop efficient solutions to complex problems.
• Initiative and independent working style.
• Passion for high quality teamwork.

What we offer:
• Flexible working hours and the possibility to work from home are a matter of course for us.
• Work with the most modern technologies.
• Your work space will be tailored to your needs.
• A fair salary and 30 days’ holiday.
• Free hot and cold beverages.
• As a member of the DRV, you receive discounts within the tourism industry, e.g., for travel, hotel stays, and rail travel.

We are currently building up our mobile app developer team in Berlin. If you're passionate about apps and want to join a young, new team in a cool industry, you've come to the right place.

We look forward to receiving your application by e-mail, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: Senior Android / iOS Developer (m/w/d)
jobs_results.description:
Möchten Sie Ihre Expertise in der Entwicklung von Android / iOS weiter ausbauen und in einer neuen beruflichen Herausforderung unter Beweis stellen? Suchen Sie nach einem Partner, der nicht nur über das erforderliche Fachwissen verfügt, sondern auch engagiert Ihre Jobsuche unterstützt? Dann ist es Zeit, den nächsten Schritt mit uns zu gehen!

Unsere Business Unit Digital Engineering, als spezialisierter Bereich der bruederlinpartner-Gruppe, vernetzt täglich Fach- und Führungskräfte aus dem Digital Engineering in der gesamten Schweiz! Dabei legen wir besonderen Wert darauf, nicht nur passende Positionen zu finden, sondern auch Ihre individuelle Karriereentwicklung zu fördern.

Für unseren Kunden in der Region Bern (BE) suchen wir Sie in der Position als: Senior Android / iOS Developer (m/w/d)

Diese Tätigkeiten begeistern Sie:
• Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von nativen und/oder Cross-Platform-Apps
• Verständnis für mobile Usability und Design-Prinzipien
• Fähigkeit zur Problemanalyse und -lösung
• Kenntnisse in der Veröffentlichung von Apps in App-Stores
• Teamfähigkeit und Kommunikationsstärk

Das zeichnet Sie aus:
• Entwicklung mobiler Anwendungen für iOS und/oder Android
• Kenntnisse in Swift, Kotlin, HTML5-Entwicklung mit ReactJS / Redux oder React Native
• Erfahrung in der Arbeit mit mobilen APIs
• Optimierung der App-Performance und -Sicherheit
• Testen und Debuggen mobiler Apps

Dies ist genau das, was Sie als neue Herausforderung suchen? Bitte kontaktieren Sie uns – wir würden Sie gerne kennenlernen und Ihnen dabei mehr über Ihren nächsten Traum-Job erzählen! Wenn Sie weitere Fragen zur Stellenausschreibung haben, dann melden Sie sich direkt bei Herr Honisch unter der Nummer: +41 41 544 12 46.

Warum Sie mit uns Ihren nächsten Karriereschritt machen

Wir sind als KMU im Familienbesitz seit über 20 Jahren die spezialisierte Partnerin für die Besetzung von Fach- und Führungskräften. Die Firmengruppe ist in verschiedene Fachbereiche unterteilt und verfügt in jedem Segment über fundierte, fachliche Kompetenz. Wer sich bei uns bewirbt muss den Anspruch haben, einen nächsten Karriereschritt erreichen zu wollen.

Dass unsere Bewerber über die nötigen fachlichen Voraussetzungen für eine ausgeschriebene Position verfügen, setzen wir voraus. Durch diese sehr engmaschige Selektion schaffen wir die Möglichkeit, für unsere Kandidatinnen und Kandidaten mehr Zeit zu haben. Zeit für eine ausführliche Beratung und umfangreiche Betreuung.

Wir gestalten die Zukunft mit

Die Unternehmensgruppe verfügt über innovative Software-Tools, die unseren Kandidatinnen und Kandidaten eine hervorragende Marktübersicht bietet. Unser Anspruch ist es, für Sie den besten aktuell verfügbaren Job zu finden.

Hinweis: Wir wertschätzen Vielfalt und begrüßen daher alle Bewerbungen – unabhängig von Geschlecht, sozialer Herkunft, Religion/Weltanschauung, Alter und Identität. Ausschreibungen der bruederlinpartner - Gruppe umfassen z.T. mehrere Kundenanfragen für ähnliche Positionen in der Region. Wir finden die am besten geeignete Position für Sie anhand Ihrer Fähigkeiten, Erfahrungen und Ausbildungen.

Weitere Interessante Jobs auf: www.digital-engineering-jobs.ch

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
iOS Mobile Developer (m/w/d)
jobs_results.description:
Informationen zum Unternehmen
• Team size

1-15
• Kategorien

Dein Aufgabenbereich
• Du hast eine solide Ausbildung als Software-Entwickler/in und bringst fundierte technische Kenntnisse mit.
• Du hast Erfahrung in der native Mobile Entwicklung für iOS (mit Swift ) und/oder Android (mit Kotlin ).
• Du arbeitest mit deklarativem UI wie Swift UI (für iOS) und/oder Jetpack Compose (für Android).
• CI/CD und automatisiertes Testing sind dir vertraut und ein Vorteil für die Qualitätssicherung.
• Du kannst elegante Lösungen nach Best Practices und Standards entwickeln.
• Deine Denkweise ist kundenorientiert , mit einem starken Servicegedanken .
• Du sprichst Deutsch verhandlungssicher und beherrschst Fach-Englisch.

Deine Skills
• Du baust Mobile Apps nach einem agilen Vorgehensmodell (basierend auf Scrum ).
• Du arbeitest in einem agilen Entwicklungsprozess mit modernen Technologien und Tools.
• Du unterstützt und förderst einen intensiven Austausch mit deinem Team von Entwickler und User Experience Designer und sorgst damit dafür, dass die Kundenlösungen stetig besser werden.

jobs_results.title: Urgent Opening For The Post Of Ar Vr Ios Android App Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
Urgent Opening For The Post Of AR/VR iOS/Android App Developer (Remote)

Urgent Opening For The Post Of AR/VR iOS/Android App Developer | Pataak IT | Worldwide

We seek a talented AR/VR iOS/Android Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality AR/VR applications for iOS and Android platforms. This role requires a strong understanding of mobile development and AR/VR technologies, and a passion for creating captivating user experiences.
Key Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and develop AR/VR applications for iOS and Android platforms.
• Implement cutting-edge AR/VR features and functionalities using industry-leading frameworks and technologies.
• Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and efficiency across different devices and platforms.
• Integrate AR/VR experiences with backend services and APIs to enable seamless data exchange and functionality.
• Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the stability and reliability of AR/VR applications.
• Stay updated on emerging trends and technologies in AR/VR development to continuously improve our products and processes.
• Work closely with designers, artists, and developers to deliver immersive and visually stunning user experiences.
Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
• Proven experience in mobile application development for iOS and Android platforms, focusing on AR/VR technologies.
• Proficiency in programming languages such as Swift, Objective-C, Java, and Kotlin.
• Strong understanding of AR/VR frameworks and SDKs, such as ARKit, ARCore, Unity, or Unreal Engine.
• Experience with 3D graphics programming, shaders, and rendering techniques.
• Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
• Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Preferred Qualifications:
• Experience with multiplayer AR/VR applications and networking protocols.
• Knowledge of machine learning and computer vision algorithms for AR/VR applications.
• Previous experience in developing applications for wearable AR/VR devices.
• Contributions to open-source AR/VR projects or communities.

Kind Regards,
Charmi
Asst. Manager – HR
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: Mobile App Developer (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
We are one of the leading international recruitment agencies for the procurement of highly qualified experts in fields such as IT lifecycle management, SAP, engineering, commerce and specialist consultancy.

For our client we are currently looking for a

Mobile App Developer (m/f/d)

General information

Reference: 158552

Location: Remote / Onsite Zurich Area

Start: 05.09.2022 / ASAP

Volume: full-time

Duration: 02.2023 +

Languages: English, German (nice to have)

Your Skills

– Several years experience in native app development (Android (Kotlin, Kotlin Coroutines) OR iOS (Swift, RxSwift)).

– Agile project experience (Scrum)

Your Tasks

– Developing native mobile apps according to the requirements of the digitalisation strategy in Android or Apple environment.

– Working in an agile team

Interested?

We look forward to receiving your application documents in electronic form.

jobs_results.title: Flutter – React native, Firebase, iOS native app development, Swift, Android native app development
jobs_results.description:
We need help deploying two apps to the app store. We will start with one called Club Spot and if that works then we will proceed to another one. If you do really well, then we'll take your help in deploying to Google too. Here are the steps: 1) run through the readme instructions and through zoom screenshare remote control, run the app on Haley's computer with Expo 2) review the real time database 3) and make sure the Expo app is actually using (i.e. making API calls to) the Firestore Realtime Database 4) test through and confirm on Haley's Expo that all the frontend functionality is working as expected 5) Help her deploy to the apple app store 6) Ensure that the latest versions of the Apple Transport App and XCode are on Haley's computer 7) You will need to work with Haley to go into her developer.apple.com account and app store connect account 8) Follow these steps to upload the React Native app to iOS Testflight 9) use remote control over zoom, go into Haley's and then make sure the app identifiers, certificates, devices, profiles are setup correctly 10) also go into her app store connect and and set up her app (i.e. bundle ID, SKU, etc.) 11) Haley and other testers will need to download the apple Testflight app 12) thoroughly have all testers test the app using testflight 13) make sure you have followed all the steps there so the app is accepted by Apple Repeat the same for Make sure to do all the submission work using zoom screenshare on her computer, so her device is signing, and so all the provisioning profiles, certificates, etc. are on her machine. Only if you need to debug the React Native or Flutter app then you can use your computer but push to git in that case. Please provide an estimate of how many hours the above steps will take for 1 app to go to Testflight. And for it to go to Apple App Store review. You should have experience deploying to the Apple App Store.

Years: Any

Location: Anywhere

Requested on: 2022-10-24
#J-18808-Ljbffr
